page.title: 14COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Only three telephone boxes were found in this area, one in the village of Pontantwn, one in the village of Meinciau, the other was situated on a minor road between B4309 and B4306. Population here is sparse. The telephones found at Pontantwn and Meinciau are situated on the B4309 Pontyates to Carmarthen road. Most farms have their own telephones. There is no Post Office in this area. Post boxes were found at Pontantwn and Meinciau. This area is made up mainly of farms, therefore, the population has to commute to the nearest village with a Post Office to buy stamps, post letters etc.. It is only in the last few years that the Meinciau and Pontantwn Post Offices closed.
